REACT_APP_demonstration.textBefore: You can have a demonstration page with a single large image. For instance, you can use this page to describe how the rest of the survey works.
You can have a demonstration page with a single video with custom size.
REACT_APP_demonstration.textAfter: For instance, you can use this page to display a tutorial video showing how the rest of the survey works.

REACT_APP_demonstration.textAfter: For instance, you can use this page to display a tutorial audio showing how the rest of the survey works.
